name: Blush
description: Blush by Gastown is a balanced hybrid strain with uplifting cerebral effects and relaxing physical attributes. This strain tends to symptoms of depression by elevating the consumer’s mood with an intense, smile-inducing euphoria. This smiley head-high slowly dissolves into the body, saddling the limbs with a calming weight that allows the consumer to relax and relinquish stressful thoughts. Enjoy Blush near the end of the day to maximize its stress relieving qualities.
descriptionPlain: Blush by Gastown is a balanced hybrid strain with uplifting cerebral effects and relaxing physical attributes. Enjoy Blush near the end of the day to maximize its stress relieving qualities.

highlightedReviews.text: blush is a strong pepper taste with a hard hit but it rushes through your head and drop to your body like no other it one of my favorites , highly recommend
Really nice flower from gastown great for daytime use and treating anxiety and the bud are covered in crystal bright Green loved this one
